entry.title: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH IN EFFECT, Ottawa (Richmond - Metcalfe)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 23.8°C
entry.summary:

Temperature: 23.8°C

Visibility: 24.1 km

entry.title: Saturday night: Showers or thunderstorms. Low 17.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers early this evening. Showers with thunderstorms beginning early this evening and ending before morning. Risk of severe thunderstorms this evening. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 this evening then light after midnight. Low 17. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Sunday: Clearing. High 20.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h late in the morning. High 20. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016
